description.translate:
You would like to know more about the other seasonal Courts? I'm not sure I can tell you a lot, darling!
 The $(b;autumn)Autumn Court$() is not concerned with the power struggle of the other Courts. 
 We care more about a good home and preparing for when winter is coming. 
Or giving those who are close to death a nice passing and good memories, before leaving them to the $(b;winter)cold slumber of Winter$()...

However, I'm still to deliver an offering of dyes, to colour the trees! We could $(b;spring)visit$() the $(b;spring)Blossoming Wealds$() and craft some dye with their flowers!
